title: Number of connected wearable devices worldwide by region 2015 to 2022
summary: Overall Wearable devices in millions has increased over the Year.
Wearable devices in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2022.
The highest Wearable devices in millions, of value 68.0 was reached at Year 2022
Minimum Wearable devices in millions about 17.5 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Wearable devices in millions has increased over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Wearable devices in millions has rose over the Year.
Wearable devices in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2022.
